CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Secure collaboration on labeled and encrypted documents with user-defined permissions (U.S. government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: ,SharePoint and OneDrive can process labeled documents that are encrypted with custom permissions, also referred to as user-defined permissions. As a result, these documents can be searched, inspected for data loss prevention, and used with eDiscovery. They can also be opened, edited, seamlessly co-authored, and support AutoSave in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint apps on all platforms (includes Office for the web).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Feature Access Management
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will have the ability to enable or disable designated Viva Engage features for specific users through the M365 admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management – Forensic evidence (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: The forensic evidence capability is an opt-in add-in to Insider Risk Management, helping customers’ security teams get visual insights into potentially risky user actions that might lead to a data security incident. Forensic evidence is off by default and policy creation requires dual authorization. Customers determine what triggers the feature and manage investigation processes. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked rolling out and has now been updated to reflect the current release phase. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.description: ,This release of eDiscovery features the implementation of customer-managed key (CMK) options, allowing users to manage their own encryption keys for the data stored in eDiscovery review sets in addition to the default, strong Microsoft-managed encryption already in place.

CurrentVersion.description:

We are introducing email and associated entities hunting capabilities to the Microsoft Graph Security API. Email meta data like email properties (subject, sender, domain etc ), MDO detections, and related entities can now be hunt via the API.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: External Guest Sharing
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow users to share whiteboards with external guests of your tenant via a personal share link (PSL). This feature will respect any OneDrive/Sharepoint sharing settings your tenant has enabled. Additionally, if your tenant has Business to Business Invitation Manager (B2B IM) enabled, this feature will allow you to send a whiteboard via PSL to external users and B2B IM will create a guest user account for them so they can access the file.

This feature will respect any OneDrive/Sharepoint sharing settings your tenant has enabled. Additionally, if your tenant has Business to Business Invitation Manager (B2B IM) enabled, this feature will allow you to send a whiteboard via PSL to external users and B2B IM will create a guest user account for them so they can access the file.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: View & Edit mode toggle
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows users with editing permissions on videos to toggle between View and Edit modes when viewing a Stream video. In View mode users can only view the video. In Edit mode users with edit permission can edit the video metadata such as title, description, chapters, and transcript. The default mode will be View. The View/Edit mode toggle is designed to prevent accidental edits to video metadata.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: View & Edit mode toggle
OldVersion.description: This feature allows users with editing permissions on videos to toggle between View and Edit modes when viewing a Stream video. In View mode users can only view the video. In Edit mode users with edit permission can edit the video metadata such as title, description, chapters, and transcript. The default mode will be View. The View/Edit mode toggle is designed to prevent accidental edits to video metadata.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows and web - Reading pane background image
CurrentVersion.description: To offer more personalization to end users, Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows will now have the ability to display a background image in the reading pane whenever emails are not selected. This feature will be turned off by default for commercial customers. A user will be able to turn on a background image by going to Settings >> General>> Appearance from Outlook.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Empower end users to report inappropriate posts and comments in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Viva Engage users are empowered to report inappropriate or concerning posts and comments within Viva Engage conversations. These reported posts are then submitted to a Communication Compliance policy for designated investigators with the appropriate role-based access control permissions to review and take action if deemed necessary. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We have updated the release phase to the reflect current state.  Additionally, this began rolling out to GA in December 2023 and did not release to Preview.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New calendar views on Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: The calendar on Teams Rooms on Android gets a new look and expanded functionalities. Users can view the calendar for the current and next day. Any available 11 minute or more time slots are shown. A visual indicator (green/purple vertical bar) is added to each time slot for users to easily see whether a room is booked or available. Available in all Teams Rooms licenses.

IT admins can configure the default number of panels and default component on panel(s) using the local device setting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced content extraction and file type coverage for DLP on Windows devices
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this release, the file type coverage to scan, classify and protect sensitive content on windows endpoint devices with Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention policies will increase from current ~40 file types to 100+ file types. This release will make the coverage of file types on endpoint consistent with other locations such as Exchange, SharePoint, and OneDrive. This will also include other enhancements like detecting label from pfile, detecting sensitive content in metadata, and detecting sensitive content in PDF forms.

This will also include other enhancements like detecting label from pfile, detecting sensitive content in metadata, and detecting sensitive content in PDF forms.

The designated staff member also receives a notification to attend the on-demand appointment.

Existing Microsoft Sticky Note users on Windows will gradually be transitioned to the new Sticky Notes app.

They can share specific goals, initiatives, dashboards, explorer views, check-ins as well as entire goals or initiative lists.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Microsoft Edge for Business - Enable organizational branding
CurrentVersion.description:
Enable your organization's branding assets from Entra onto profile-related UI for profiles signed in with an Entra ID (formerly known as Azure Active Directory) account. You can add your organization’s details such as name to the profile pill, name and brand color to the profile flyout, and logo to overlay the Edge for Business taskbar icon. This branding can help users more easily differentiate between multiple profiles and browser windows. Default organizational branding can be enabled by admins through the following policies: OrganizationalBrandingOnWorkProfileUIEnabled and OrganizationLogoOverlayOnAppIconEnabled. Admins will need to have 'company branding' assets configured in the Microsoft Entra admin center for branding assets to be applied to this feature.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-for-business#company-branding

CurrentVersion.title: Exchange: Microsoft Defender for Office 365 - Quarantine End User Allow and Block list management
CurrentVersion.description: We are Updating the experience for end user allow and block list management of their emails. With one click, end users will block emails from unwanted senders and prevent those emails from showing up in their default quarantine view anymore as well as in their Quarantine notifications. End users will also be able to allow emails from trusted senders and prevent future emails from those senders from landing in quarantine given there are no Admin overrides in place. End users will also have visibility into Admin overrides that led to a Quarantined email message if there is one.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Quicker sign in without entering the domain name
CurrentVersion.description: Users can skip typing the full user principal name (UPN) and sign in faster on shared and managed devices, by using app configuration policies to autofill the domain name.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Ability to create custom tags in Communication Compliance policies
CurrentVersion.description: Communication Compliance introduces the ability to create custom tags to give Investigators the flexibility of using tags that fit their team/ organization's requirements. Leverage custom tags to leave more meaningful information for each policy match and to help other investigators understand the status of a message. Default tags will continue to be available for use.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Open Teams app content in multi-window stageview
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams enables you to open your app content in new multi-window experiences. Unlock multi-tasking workflows for your users inside Teams. Allow them to engage with content and conversation, side-by-side.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Open Teams app content in multi-window stageview

CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams now works seamlessly with Apple AirPods to mute or unmute yourself on Mac models running macOS Sonoma. The same functionality already available on iPhone running iOS 17 is now supported on new Teams for Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: See multiple participants and shared content preview in improved presenter window when screen sharing
CurrentVersion.description: When sharing the screen or content, the presenter will now be able to better keep track of the participants' activity during a meeting. The Improved Presenter Window shows up to four meeting participants (both video and audio), who are active speakers and who raised hands, as well as a preview of the content being shared. Meeting notifications appear in the middle of the screen for better visibility.  This gives presenters increased confidence and awareness of what is happening among participants during a meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: New landing experience for Viva Connections desktop
CurrentVersion.description: Help people in your organization manage their daily flow of work using a customized landing experience in Teams that displays the most important tasks, tools, news, and resources in one central place. The new landing experience offers expanded navigational tools between Viva apps and acts as the home base for Viva experiences in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Regional announcements for FLW users in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Create and share time sensitive messages in Viva Connections and target your FLW users based on attributes including job, description and title. You can view these announcements on Viva Connections desktop, mobile and tablet.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Dashboard personalization on desktop in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Customize your dashboard by adding, removing or reordering the dashboard cards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - New device properties in device onboarding page
CurrentVersion.description: ,Added new device details to provide more insights on the device health. This includes OS build, Defender engine version, Defender Mocamp version, sensitive data activity, Advanced Classification bandwidth usage exceeded, valid user, server DLP status, and first onboarded date.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Cloud egress groups (macOS)
CurrentVersion.description: ,Restrict sensitive files that match your policies from being shared with unrestricted cloud service domains. Restrict the use of specified web browsers, identified by their executable names. The specified browsers are blocked from accessing files that match the conditions of an enforced a DLP policy where the upload-to-cloud services restriction is set to block or block override.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Video clip in channel
CurrentVersion.description: You can now use Teams video clip in channel, in addition to chat. Record yourself, your screen, or an audio-only clip and attach the video clip to your channel post or reply.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - HighCompleteness parameter in Search-UnifiedAuditLog Audit cmdlet
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft is introducing a new query parameter which allows you to switch between performance and completeness of query results based on the scenario requirement. When enabled, the query returns more complete search results but may take significantly longer to run. When disabled, the query runs faster but may have missing search results.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Remove export limit in Device Onboarding page
CurrentVersion.description: ,Ability to export all from the device onboarding page without page limits.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Modern eDiscovery in new Microsoft Purview Portal
CurrentVersion.description: ,Introducing a modernized user interface for key eDiscovery workflows, with simplified creation for cases, searches, and holds. Enhanced data source management allows for easy mapping of all data locations for users, groups, or Teams, with the ability to query location changes and frequent collaborator mapping. View key search statistics trends, including top data sources, sensitive information types, and content types. Long-running processes such as add to review and export now provide full visibility on progress and ETA, with detailed reporting on settings, query input, and item-level location reporting upon completion.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced privacy control: Limiting PII data access to "Data Classification Content Viewer" role
CurrentVersion.description: ,There will be an improvement in privacy measures. Access to PII data will be restricted. Only users with the specific role of "Data Classification Content Viewers" will be able to access this sensitive data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - DLP Analytics and Recommendations to understand risks, improve existing policies and improve posture
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview DLP overview page will have two new cards:  for DLP with 2 Cards that show Analytics with 1-click recommendations: Highlighting the key risk and the option to create a one-click policy to mitigate the risk, and Recommendation to fine tune existing DLP policies to make them effective and reduce alerts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: macOS Platform SSO Support
CurrentVersion.description: ,Enable logging in on a managed Mac using your Entra ID password.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New filters in Audit Search
CurrentVersion.description: ,Audit Search allows customers to retrieve audit logs relevant to a security or compliance investigation. With this change, customers will now be able to search for relevant audit logs using additional fields such as ObjectId, UserKey, UserType, IP Address, DocumentId, SiteId, and AppId.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live Share SDK support for meeting extensions
CurrentVersion.description:
Live Share is a new developer capability designed to transform Teams meeting apps into collaborative multi-user experiences without writing any dedicated back-end code. Live Share SDK support for meeting extensions enables general-purpose collaboration features, turn-key media synchronization to co-watch videos in meetings, and inking, cursors & annotations.


More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftteams/platform/apps-in-teams-meetings/teams-live-share-overview?tabs=javascript

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Automatic chapters for Teams meeting recordings from PowerPoint Live sharing
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, chapters will automatically be created for your Teams meeting recording when you share your slides during the meeting with PowerPoint Live. This will help meeting recording viewers easily find the right part of the meeting to watch based on when slides are presented. This feature is part of Teams Premium.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Automatic chapters for Teams meeting recordings from PowerPoint Live sharing
OldVersion.description: With this feature, chapters will automatically be created for your Teams meeting recording when you share your slides during the meeting with PowerPoint Live. This will help meeting recording viewers easily find the right part of the meeting to watch based on when slides are presented. This feature is part of Teams Premium.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Secure collaboration on labeled and encrypted documents with user-defined permissions (U.S. government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: ,SharePoint and OneDrive can process labeled documents that are encrypted with custom permissions, also referred to as user-defined permissions. As a result, these documents can be searched, inspected for data loss prevention, and used with eDiscovery. They can also be opened, edited, seamlessly co-authored, and support AutoSave in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint apps on all platforms (includes Office for the web).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Feature Access Management
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will have the ability to enable or disable designated Viva Engage features for specific users through the M365 admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management – Forensic evidence (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: The forensic evidence capability is an opt-in add-in to Insider Risk Management, helping customers’ security teams get visual insights into potentially risky user actions that might lead to a data security incident. Forensic evidence is off by default and policy creation requires dual authorization. Customers determine what triggers the feature and manage investigation processes. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked rolling out and has now been updated to reflect the current release phase. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - CMK (Customer Managed Keys) encryption support for data at-rest in Review sets
CurrentVersion.description: ,This release of eDiscovery features the implementation of customer-managed key (CMK) options, allowing users to manage their own encryption keys for the data stored in eDiscovery review sets in addition to the default, strong Microsoft-managed encryption already in place.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - CMK (Customer Managed Keys) encryption support for data at-rest in Review sets
CurrentVersion.description: ,This release of eDiscovery features the implementation of customer-managed key (CMK) options, allowing users to manage their own encryption keys for the data stored in eDiscovery review sets in addition to the default, strong Microsoft-managed encryption already in place.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Email and associated entities hunting capabilities available through Microsoft Graph Security API
CurrentVersion.description:
,
We are introducing email and associated entities hunting capabilities to the Microsoft Graph Security API. Email meta data like email properties (subject, sender, domain etc ), MDO detections, and related entities can now be hunt via the API.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: External Guest Sharing
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow users to share whiteboards with external guests of your tenant via a personal share link (PSL). This feature will respect any OneDrive/Sharepoint sharing settings your tenant has enabled. Additionally, if your tenant has Business to Business Invitation Manager (B2B IM) enabled, this feature will allow you to send a whiteboard via PSL to external users and B2B IM will create a guest user account for them so they can access the file.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: View & Edit mode toggle
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows users with editing permissions on videos to toggle between View and Edit modes when viewing a Stream video. In View mode users can only view the video. In Edit mode users with edit permission can edit the video metadata such as title, description, chapters, and transcript. The default mode will be View. The View/Edit mode toggle is designed to prevent accidental edits to video metadata.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows and web - Reading pane background image
CurrentVersion.description: To offer more personalization to end users, Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows will now have the ability to display a background image in the reading pane whenever emails are not selected. This feature will be turned off by default for commercial customers. A user will be able to turn on a background image by going to Settings >> General>> Appearance from Outlook.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Empower end users to report inappropriate posts and comments in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Viva Engage users are empowered to report inappropriate or concerning posts and comments within Viva Engage conversations. These reported posts are then submitted to a Communication Compliance policy for designated investigators with the appropriate role-based access control permissions to review and take action if deemed necessary. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We have updated the release phase to the reflect current state.  Additionally, this began rolling out to GA in December 2023 and did not release to Preview.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Share an Update to Outlook with Goal Broadcast
CurrentVersion.description: With "Share an Update," leaders can share updates of their team goals to the members of their organization directly from Viva Goals. Updates are sent to users via email. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase to reflect the current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: View your Microsoft Planner plans and Microsoft To Do lists in the Microsoft 365 Homepage
CurrentVersion.description: Recently accessed plans and lists will now appear in the quick access list on the Microsoft 365 homepage, helping users more quickly discover and take action on their tasks.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New calendar views on Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: The calendar on Teams Rooms on Android gets a new look and expanded functionalities. Users can view the calendar for the current and next day. Any available 11 minute or more time slots are shown. A visual indicator (green/purple vertical bar) is added to each time slot for users to easily see whether a room is booked or available. Available in all Teams Rooms licenses.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved View switcher and Front of Room display controls for Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: The updated interface for the Teams Rooms on Android View Switcher menu provides end users with more control of the front of room display(s) during a meeting and enables customizations including visibility of the meeting chat and which meeting component is displayed on the left and right panel for Front Row. IT admins can configure the default number of panels and default component on panel(s) using the local device setting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting protection support on Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Rooms on Android devices apply the Teams Premium meeting security features including end-to-end encryption and sensitivity labels if the meeting organizer has them turned on.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie: automatically listen to multiple channels
CurrentVersion.description: Walkie Talkie, a push-to-talk experience that enables clear and secure voice communication over the cloud, enables teams to communicate instantly on a channel. Through this new functionality, users can now connect to, up to 5 favorite channels in multi-channel mode, automatically listen to incoming transmission from these favorited channels and initiate easily initiate PTT transmission on these channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Management of BYOD (Bring your own device) meeting spaces with Teams Rooms Pro Management
CurrentVersion.description: The BYOD (bring your own device) rooms in the Pro Management Portal provides IT admins with a comprehensive overview of their BYOD rooms' utilization and activities. With this new addition, IT admins will gain valuable insights into how these spaces are being utilized, enabling them to make data driven decisions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Translation
CurrentVersion.description: A new service that enables users to translate documents quickly and accurately among dozens of languages based on specific metadata or on-demand.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Branded Meetings - Join Launcher Screen with Brand Image and Logo Support (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: The Teams Join Launcher web page will now support the brand logo and brand image uploaded for branded meetings. This is a Teams Premium feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Manage Microsoft Surface Hub as a Teams Rooms on Windows device
CurrentVersion.description: With the transition of Microsoft Surface Hub devices to the Teams Rooms on Windows platform, Admins can now manage Surface Hub devices as Teams Rooms on Windows devices in the Teams Admin Center and Teams Rooms Pro Management (available for Teams Rooms Pro license customers).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Network Analytics
CurrentVersion.description:
,
This new analytics capability helps users understand engagement trends across their entire organization. Network analytics provides an at-a-glance overview of your organization’s top usage trends including employee sentiment, cross-community insights and AI-powered summarization to help you stay up-to-date with all the activity that occurs within your company.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Conversation Analytics
CurrentVersion.description: ,Updates to conversation analytics will allow users to better understand engagement trends that occur on their posts including employee sentiment on popular conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Keyword highlight support for document trainable classifiers
CurrentVersion.description: Highlight the keywords/phrases that are contributing significantly to the Trainable classifier results, so that users can easily understand the classification of the documents. This would build trust of the users of the OOB classifications and empower them to create DLP policies.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft 365 Archive for Sites
CurrentVersion.description: ,The feature enables you to save on costs of storage exceeding the quota limit by archiving the inactive sites in SharePoint. The status has been adjusted to correctly reflect the current status of this feature. We apologize for any confusion.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced content extraction and file type coverage for DLP on Windows devices
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this release, the file type coverage to scan, classify and protect sensitive content on windows endpoint devices with Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention policies will increase from current ~40 file types to 100+ file types. This release will make the coverage of file types on endpoint consistent with other locations such as Exchange, SharePoint, and OneDrive. This will also include other enhancements like detecting label from pfile, detecting sensitive content in metadata, and detecting sensitive content in PDF forms.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - recommendations for new policies and policy finetuning
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Microsoft Purview DLP overview page will have two new cards: for DLP with 2 Cards that show Analytics with 1-click recommendations: Highlighting the key risk and the option to create a one-click policy to mitigate the risk, and Recommendation to fine tune existing DLP policies to make them effective and reduce alerts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create up to 50 Viva Connections experiences within a tenant
CurrentVersion.description: Customers with Viva suite or Viva Communications and Communities license can create up to 50 distinct Connections experiences for their audience groups. This is currently limited to only 10 experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Expanded reactions in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: We're expanding the set of reactions available in all instances of Viva Engage. Users will see an additional 24 icons on top of the 6 we already offer. These new icons cover a wide range of emotions and sentiments, helping users express themselves and improve engagement in your network.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Multi-instance app customization support for Teams apps
CurrentVersion.description: IT admin has the ability to customize Teams apps to align with the company’s brand and enhance their usefulness for employees. By creating and managing multiple customized app instances, it can improve branding, awareness, and user engagement, overcomes the limitations of a single-instance approach and enables greater adaptability to meet the diverse business needs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teachers can (manually) update parent data in Parent App
CurrentVersion.description: Allow teachers to add and edit existing parent data inside the Parent app. This request to update parent information can be directly made by teachers inside the Parent app. Once the request is raised, it needs an admin approval before updating the parent information in the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teachers can (manually) update parent data in Parent App
CurrentVersion.description: Allow teachers to add and edit existing parent data inside the Parent app. This request to update parent information can be directly made by teachers inside the Parent app. Once the request is raised, it needs an admin approval before updating the parent information in the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Domain/URL Update
CurrentVersion.description: To align the URL with the new Viva Engage branding and as part of the unified domain for Microsoft 365 initiative, Viva Engage’s URL schema is being updated. This change includes domains only. A separate roadmap will be created for email sender changes. Note: The release month and status have been updated to show current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Alert improvements
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature is about improving the alerting capabilities and customization in Communication Compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Admins can provide intent while submitting
CurrentVersion.description: Admins submitting to Microsoft can convey whether they are submitting for a second opinion or they are submitting to convey their confirmation of clean or malicious verdict.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Last used date inside Tenant Allow Block List
CurrentVersion.description: Tenant allow block list domains & addresses, URL, and file entries will show last used date. This helps admins understand when an entry was last used (either at mailflow or time of click), helping them remove entries which are no longer needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Attack Simulation Training in DoD
CurrentVersion.description: Attack simulation and training (AST) in the Microsoft Defender for Office 365 is an intelligent risk reduction tool, which allows customers to run realistic attack scenarios in their organization, identify vulnerable users, and help drive behavior change through an integrated security awareness training program. It is to be made available in the DoD environment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for transcript-only meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap will support meetings with only transcript enabled, and without recording enabled. In the case when only transcript is enabled for a meeting, the features from intelligent recap that users can access are AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. Intelligent recap features are also available as a part of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Project: Additional capabilities for Microsoft 365 users in Microsoft Project for the web
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, users with Microsoft 365 licenses can view projects shared with them by users of Microsoft Project for the web. This update will enable Microsoft 365 users to collaborate more seamlessly with Project users by editing shared projects. The added capabilities enable Microsoft 365 users to access any functionality where Microsoft Planner and Microsoft Project for the web overlap. Note: This feature is specific to projects that are created within the default environment, such as by using project.microsoft.com.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Assign staff and set duration for on-demand Virtual Appointments (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Scheduling administrators and staff managing on-demand appointments can assign specific staff members and set appointment duration to handle on-demand services. This ensures that when an on-demand appointment is requested, there is a designated staff member assigned to the appointment and a defined duration for the appointment is set. The designated staff member also receives a notification to attend the on-demand appointment.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: In-Person Event
CurrentVersion.description: New option during event creation in Outlook will allow organizer to request invitees to attend the event in person. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: View, download and delete OneDrive transcript files in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: We are simplifying the storage and management of meeting transcript files by focusing transcript actions such as view, download, and delete to source from one place (OneDrive for Business) instead of two places (OneDrive for Business and Exchange Online).

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Preview of New Sticky Notes app on Windows available from OneNote app
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft is expanding its notetaking solution, OneNote, to include users who need a simple and quick way to jot down ideas and remember important information while staying focused on the task at hand. New Sticky Notes is a new experience built on the foundation of OneNote that offers the same experience as existing Sticky Notes, while making it easier to capture screenshots, automatically add the source information to the notes, and more. Existing Microsoft Sticky Note users on Windows will gradually be transitioned to the new Sticky Notes app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams admin center - external domain activity report
CurrentVersion.description: The external domain activity report will show Teams administrators which domains their users communicate with. Available for both those with open federation on and those with explicit allow lists.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Teams Channels announcements in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: If a Frontline worker (FLW) licensed user is @mentioned in a Teams channel announcement, the announcement will be displayed in Viva Connections so that the user can find all their important updates in a single place.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tags will be supported in Private Channels
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now use team tags to @ mention groups of people in private channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tags will be supported in Private Channels
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now use team tags to @ mention groups of people in private channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Improved issue details for service health
CurrentVersion.description:
We are introducing a new version of the service health issue details pane (the surface that appears when you click on a service incident or service advisory to view details).

The new version substantially reduces the amount of duplicated text and brings key information forward with improved formatting.  This gives you quicker access to the information you need, reducing the time and effort required to get up to speed on service incident details.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - New goal sharing experience
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now be able to experience the enhanced share functionality with supported platforms including Teams, Email, Slack along with Copy link options. They can share specific goals, initiatives, dashboards, explorer views, check-ins as well as entire goals or initiative lists.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Microsoft Edge for Business - Enable organizational branding
CurrentVersion.description:
Enable your organization's branding assets from Entra onto profile-related UI for profiles signed in with an Entra ID (formerly known as Azure Active Directory) account. You can add your organization’s details such as name to the profile pill, name and brand color to the profile flyout, and logo to overlay the Edge for Business taskbar icon. This branding can help users more easily differentiate between multiple profiles and browser windows. Default organizational branding can be enabled by admins through the following policies: OrganizationalBrandingOnWorkProfileUIEnabled and OrganizationLogoOverlayOnAppIconEnabled. Admins will need to have 'company branding' assets configured in the Microsoft Entra admin center for branding assets to be applied to this feature.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-for-business#company-branding

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join meetings and make calls on Android Auto
CurrentVersion.description: Teams on Android Auto lets you easily join meetings from the calendar view, quickly call your speed dial contacts and see your recent calls on your Android phones.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Admin setting for uploading files using drag-drop
CurrentVersion.description: Admin will be able to control the default content app for local files uploaded using drag-drop in chat and channels. OneDrive / SharePoint are the existing default locations for uploads using drag-drop.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Content camera on New Teams Desktop
CurrentVersion.description: This feature it will be available on new Team Teams on Windows and Mac, making whiteboards, printed documents, books, and other physical objects the focus of your Teams meeting. With minimal setup, you can help meeting attendees who aren’t in the room feel more included and engaged in your next class, demo, or brainstorming session.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Granular Add-ins availability control from education Office Store
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, education tenant administrators will be able to manage the availability of Add-ins from the Office store at a more granular level. We will provide three options—Non-adult student, Adult student, and Faculty and staff—under Microsoft admin center > Org Settings > User owned apps and services > Let users access the Office store. The options are based on the user's role and age group properties.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Granular Add-ins availability control from education Office Store
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, education tenant administrators will be able to manage the availability of Add-ins from the Office store at a more granular level. We will provide three options—Non-adult student, Adult student, and Faculty and staff—under Microsoft admin center > Org Settings > User owned apps and services > Let users access the Office store. The options are based on the user's role and age group properties.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create more than one Connections experience in the same tenant
CurrentVersion.description: This new capability enables customers to create multiple distinct Connections experiences and corresponding home sites within the same tenant. Common scenarios include conglomerates or subsidiaries that require different Connections experiences for different users, each with its own dashboard, feed and resources.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Organize and reorder folders in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Users can arrange folders in any desired order effortlessly by dragging and dropping the folders in the position that they want.

CurrentVersion.title: Exchange: Microsoft Defender for Office 365 - Quarantine End User Allow and Block list management
CurrentVersion.description: We are Updating the experience for end user allow and block list management of their emails. With one click, end users will block emails from unwanted senders and prevent those emails from showing up in their default quarantine view anymore as well as in their Quarantine notifications. End users will also be able to allow emails from trusted senders and prevent future emails from those senders from landing in quarantine given there are no Admin overrides in place. End users will also have visibility into Admin overrides that led to a Quarantined email message if there is one.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: screen recorder on mobile device
CurrentVersion.description: We are not releasing this feature at this time and apologize for any inconvenience. You can use Teams on your Android device to record your screen and share it with others in any channel or chat. Just press and hold the camera icon next to the compose box and then tap the screen recorder icon to begin the recording.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Copy simulation action in Attack Simulation Training
CurrentVersion.description: Using the copy simulation action button, Attack simulation administrators will be able to effortlessly duplicate existing simulations and make necessary edits to introduce fresh and tailored simulation scenarios.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: A single desktop app for all user types
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams on Windows and Mac will support every type of Teams account (work, school or personal) in a single desktop application.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Microsoft Edge for Business - Customize organizational branding using Edge Management Service
CurrentVersion.description:
Admins can customize their organization's branding assets through Microsoft Edge management service onto Edge for Business. Admins can enable and configure branding onto profile-related UI for profiles signed in with an Entra ID (formerly known as Azure Active Directory) account. You can configure your organization’s details such as name to the profile pill; name, logo, and brand color to the profile flyout; and logo to overlay the Edge for Business taskbar icon. This branding can help users more easily differentiate between multiple profiles and browser windows. This Microsoft Edge management service will give admins an enhanced experience to control, preview, and customize assets.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-for-business#company-branding

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Quicker sign in without entering the domain name
CurrentVersion.description: Users can skip typing the full user principal name (UPN) and sign in faster on shared and managed devices, by using app configuration policies to autofill the domain name.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Quicker sign in without entering the domain name
CurrentVersion.description: Users can skip typing the full user principal name (UPN) and sign in faster on shared and managed devices, by using app configuration policies to autofill the domain name.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Ability to create custom tags in Communication Compliance policies
CurrentVersion.description: Communication Compliance introduces the ability to create custom tags to give Investigators the flexibility of using tags that fit their team/ organization's requirements. Leverage custom tags to leave more meaningful information for each policy match and to help other investigators understand the status of a message. Default tags will continue to be available for use.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Open Teams app content in multi-window stageview
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams enables you to open your app content in new multi-window experiences. Unlock multi-tasking workflows for your users inside Teams. Allow them to engage with content and conversation, side-by-side.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Open Teams app content in multi-window stageview
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams enables you to open your app content in new multi-window experiences. Unlock multi-tasking workflows for your users inside Teams. Allow them to engage with content and conversation, side-by-side.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Use Apple AirPods to mute/unmute yourself in Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams now works seamlessly with Apple AirPods to mute or unmute yourself on Mac models running macOS Sonoma. The same functionality already available on iPhone running iOS 17 is now supported on new Teams for Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: See multiple participants and shared content preview in improved presenter window when screen sharing
CurrentVersion.description: When sharing the screen or content, the presenter will now be able to better keep track of the participants' activity during a meeting. The Improved Presenter Window shows up to four meeting participants (both video and audio), who are active speakers and who raised hands, as well as a preview of the content being shared. Meeting notifications appear in the middle of the screen for better visibility.  This gives presenters increased confidence and awareness of what is happening among participants during a meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Question level permissions
CurrentVersion.description: Enable question level permissions for survey takers

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Access through M365 header
CurrentVersion.description: Solution available on M365 header for improved discoverability

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Via Glint - Access through Viva App Bar
CurrentVersion.description: Solution available on Viva App Bar and Viva Home for improved discoverability.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Upload custom PowerPoint templates
CurrentVersion.description: Ability to upload custom PowerPoint templates for exports

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: New landing experience for Viva Connections desktop
CurrentVersion.description: Help people in your organization manage their daily flow of work using a customized landing experience in Teams that displays the most important tasks, tools, news, and resources in one central place. The new landing experience offers expanded navigational tools between Viva apps and acts as the home base for Viva experiences in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Regional announcements for FLW users in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Create and share time sensitive messages in Viva Connections and target your FLW users based on attributes including job, description and title. You can view these announcements on Viva Connections desktop, mobile and tablet.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Dashboard personalization on desktop in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Customize your dashboard by adding, removing or reordering the dashboard cards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - New device properties in device onboarding page
CurrentVersion.description: ,Added new device details to provide more insights on the device health. This includes OS build, Defender engine version, Defender Mocamp version, sensitive data activity, Advanced Classification bandwidth usage exceeded, valid user, server DLP status, and first onboarded date.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Cloud egress groups (macOS)
CurrentVersion.description: ,Restrict sensitive files that match your policies from being shared with unrestricted cloud service domains. Restrict the use of specified web browsers, identified by their executable names. The specified browsers are blocked from accessing files that match the conditions of an enforced a DLP policy where the upload-to-cloud services restriction is set to block or block override.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Video clip in channel
CurrentVersion.description: You can now use Teams video clip in channel, in addition to chat. Record yourself, your screen, or an audio-only clip and attach the video clip to your channel post or reply.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - HighCompleteness parameter in Search-UnifiedAuditLog Audit cmdlet
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft is introducing a new query parameter which allows you to switch between performance and completeness of query results based on the scenario requirement. When enabled, the query returns more complete search results but may take significantly longer to run. When disabled, the query runs faster but may have missing search results.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Remove export limit in Device Onboarding page
CurrentVersion.description: ,Ability to export all from the device onboarding page without page limits.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Modern eDiscovery in new Microsoft Purview Portal
CurrentVersion.description: ,Introducing a modernized user interface for key eDiscovery workflows, with simplified creation for cases, searches, and holds. Enhanced data source management allows for easy mapping of all data locations for users, groups, or Teams, with the ability to query location changes and frequent collaborator mapping. View key search statistics trends, including top data sources, sensitive information types, and content types. Long-running processes such as add to review and export now provide full visibility on progress and ETA, with detailed reporting on settings, query input, and item-level location reporting upon completion.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced privacy control: Limiting PII data access to "Data Classification Content Viewer" role
CurrentVersion.description: ,There will be an improvement in privacy measures. Access to PII data will be restricted. Only users with the specific role of "Data Classification Content Viewers" will be able to access this sensitive data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - DLP Analytics and Recommendations to understand risks, improve existing policies and improve posture
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview DLP overview page will have two new cards:  for DLP with 2 Cards that show Analytics with 1-click recommendations: Highlighting the key risk and the option to create a one-click policy to mitigate the risk, and Recommendation to fine tune existing DLP policies to make them effective and reduce alerts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: macOS Platform SSO Support
CurrentVersion.description: ,Enable logging in on a managed Mac using your Entra ID password.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New filters in Audit Search
CurrentVersion.description: ,Audit Search allows customers to retrieve audit logs relevant to a security or compliance investigation. With this change, customers will now be able to search for relevant audit logs using additional fields such as ObjectId, UserKey, UserType, IP Address, DocumentId, SiteId, and AppId.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topics in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Update: We began rolling out this feature out, in late March, ahead of the previously scheduled time. We apologize for any inconvenience. Display topic highlights and access topic cards in Yammer conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Custom result types in Microsoft Search
CurrentVersion.description: New support for custom result types allows you to create result types with modern display templates with adaptive cards for SharePoint content (PDF, sites, pages and lists) for SharePoint home and sites, Office.com and Bing.com.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Record a new video on the Stream Start page in Office for Government clouds
CurrentVersion.description: Users can create a new video directly from the Stream Start page in Office web by recording their webcam and/or screen. The new video is uploaded to OneDrive and ready to share.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Contact lists
CurrentVersion.description: The new Outlook for Mac is adding support for Contact lists (aka Personal Distribution Lists).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live Share SDK support for meeting extensions
CurrentVersion.description:
Live Share is a new developer capability designed to transform Teams meeting apps into collaborative multi-user experiences without writing any dedicated back-end code. Live Share SDK support for meeting extensions enables general-purpose collaboration features, turn-key media synchronization to co-watch videos in meetings, and inking, cursors & annotations.


More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftteams/platform/apps-in-teams-meetings/teams-live-share-overview?tabs=javascript

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Automatic chapters for Teams meeting recordings from PowerPoint Live sharing
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, chapters will automatically be created for your Teams meeting recording when you share your slides during the meeting with PowerPoint Live. This will help meeting recording viewers easily find the right part of the meeting to watch based on when slides are presented. This feature is part of Teams Premium.
